content: Won't anyone introduce us to @leanprover-community-bot-assistant? :grinning:

Mathlib has grown so big that that leanprover-community-bot together with the part-time github-actions[bot] could no longer keep up with all of the administrative tasks. We are happy to welcome leanprover-community-bot-assistant to the team, who will support the project by managing issue labels on github. #11274
Don't forget our beloved gatekeeper
